movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief who specializes in stealing secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into the mind of a CEO, leading to a mind-bending heist that challenges reality itself.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A man wrongfully convicted of murder forms a friendship with a fellow inmate, and together they endure the hardships of prison life while planning an elaborate escape.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The powerful Corleone crime family faces a dangerous transformation as Michael, the youngest son, reluctantly gets involved in the family business, navigating betrayal, loyalty, and the price of power.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest challenge when a criminal mastermind known as the Joker emerges, pushing Gotham to the brink of anarchy and testing the limits of Batman's moral code.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The intertwining stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles unfold in a nonlinear narrative, where hitmen, a boxer, and a couple find themselves entangled in a world of violence, drugs, and chance encounters.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The life of a slow-witted but kind-hearted man unfolds against the backdrop of historical events, showing how he inadvertently influences major moments in American history, from the Vietnam War to the Watergate scandal.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker learns that reality as he knows it is a simulated construct controlled by machines, and he is chosen to lead a rebellion against the system to free humanity.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After the devastating events of 'Infinity War,' the remaining Avengers work together to undo the destruction caused by Thanos, culminating in a final battle to save the universe.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family cunningly infiltrates the lives of a wealthy family, leading to a series of events that reveal the stark class divide and result in shocking consequences.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: A young girl finds herself trapped in a mysterious and magical world of spirits and creatures after her parents are transformed into pigs, and she must work to save them and find a way back home.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.description: Barbie embarks on an existential journey from her perfect world in Barbie Land to the real world, discovering who she is and questioning her place in a society that holds unrealistic expectations.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda
movies.description: A clumsy and overweight panda is unexpectedly chosen to become a kung fu master, and must train with the Furious Five to defeat a formidable villain and fulfill his destiny.

movies.title: 28 Days Later
movies.description: After a viral outbreak turns people into violent, rage-fueled zombies, a group of survivors struggles to find safety and humanity in a desolate post-apocalyptic world.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: As Earth faces an environmental collapse, a group of astronauts journeys through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet, facing time dilation and existential dilemmas along the way.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: A new blade runner uncovers long-buried secrets about the origins of replicants, leading to a journey that could change the future of humanity and artificial life forever.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: An ambitious young jazz drummer is pushed to his limits by an abusive and demanding instructor, exploring the cost of greatness and the pursuit of perfection.

movies.title: The Godfather Part II
movies.description: The story continues as Michael Corleone struggles to expand the family's criminal empire while reflecting on his father's rise to power, further exploring themes of betrayal, loyalty, and corruption.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: After the death of his beloved dog, a retired hitman is pulled back into the violent world he left behind, seeking revenge against those who wronged him, setting off a relentless pursuit.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa, a rebellious woman seeking to escape a tyrannical warlord, in a high-octane, action-packed chase for survival.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.description: After a botched diamond heist, a group of criminals turns on each other, unsure of who betrayed them, as the tension mounts in a series of explosive confrontations.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.description: A grumpy, green ogre embarks on a quest to rescue Princess Fiona, only to discover that he is more than just an outsider, finding love and friendship in the process.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: A young lion prince named Simba must overcome his fears and embrace his destiny to become king, after the tragic death of his father and the betrayal of his uncle.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.description: Based on true events, paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren are called to help a family plagued by disturbing supernatural occurrences in their rural farmhouse.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.description: A family's dark secrets are revealed after the death of the matriarch, leading to a series of horrifying events that uncover the disturbing truth about their lineage.

movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.description: Bilbo Baggins, a reluctant hobbit, is swept into an adventure with a group of dwarves to reclaim their homeland from a fearsome dragon, encountering danger and mythical creatures along the way.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.description: In post-Civil War Spain, a young girl escapes the harsh realities of life through a magical labyrinth, where she meets a faun who gives her three dangerous tasks to prove her worth.
